title: DC++
content:
DC++ is the BEST place to download Comics.

Download AirDC++ and install it.
Press Ctrl+Q and connect to perfection.comichub.org:777.
Type !reg <your password> (the password must be just numbers and letters, No special characters).
Type /fav to save the hub to your favorite hubs and to auto-connecting at startup.
Type !rules, !faq, And !42 and read them.
Search for these two files and download them:

A Guide to Fixing Your Repack Filled Share.pdf
A Simple Guide to Repacks on the Comic Sharing DC++ hubs and How to Avoid Them v1.txt

Add 5GB of comics to your share (better to just download them from the hub)
